text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

name: ProbleemStatusCodelijst_to_ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
title: ProbleemStatusCodelijst to ConditionClinicalStatusCodes
description: Maps ProblemStatus codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Problem v4.4 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Problem-v4.4(2020EN)) to ConditionClinicalStatusCodes codes as found in FHIR R4.
